name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Ambitious and results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in developing high-performance applications in cloud environments, specifically **AWS** and **Azure**. Expertise in designing and implementing APIs and integrations with various SaaS and PaaS providers, leveraging a wide array of technologies including **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **HTML5**, and **Backbone.js**. Adept in creating RESTful and SOAP services, ensuring seamless data communication through protocols such as AJAX and WebSockets.

Proficient in utilizing front-end frameworks like **React**, **Vue**, and **Bootstrap**, and experienced in backend technologies including **FastAPI** and **Django** to establish robust enterprise solutions. Strong foundation in microservices architecture, employing CI/CD practices to enhance deployment efficiency and reduce time-to-market.

Natural problem-solver with excellent communication and time management skills, I have successfully led cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise-grade platforms while ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Skilled in real-time data processing and machine learning pipelines, making innovative use of tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow** to optimize performance and maintain scalability.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained APIs using **Node.js** and **Express.js**, ensuring efficient communication and integration between **back-end** and **front-end** services.
Utilized **AWS** services for building and deploying **SaaS** applications, leveraging tools like **Lambda**, **DynamoDB**, and **S3** for scalable solutions.
Implemented responsive **HTML5** and **JavaScript** interfaces, enhancing user experience through frameworks like **React** and **Vue.js**, achieving a **30%** increase in user engagement metrics.
optimized UI/UX using **Bootstrap** and **jQuery** to deliver efficient and engaging web applications for a diverse user base.
Designed and deployed server-side applications using **FastAPI** and **Python**, achieving a **25%** improvement in application performance and scalability.
Led the integration of **AJAX** and **WebSockets** for real-time data transmission, reducing latency and improving response times by **40%**.
Executed effective time management and problem-solving strategies to minimize project delivery times by **15%** through agile methodologies.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build and maintain **DevOps** practices using tools like **GitHub Actions** and **CI/CD** pipelines, facilitating smoother deployments and reducing downtime.
Conducted thorough testing practices using **Postman** and **Jest**, ensuring high-quality code and minimizing bugs to less than **5%** in production environments.
Oversaw the full software development lifecycle, from concept to deployment, while ensuring alignment with business objectives and client needs regarding **CTI**, **SaaS**, and **PaaS** solutions.

• Developed **APIs** for financial platforms, enhancing accessibility and interoperability across various systems, leveraging **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django).
• Designed and implemented user interfaces using **HTML5**, **JavaScript**, **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, significantly improving user experience for over **10,000** daily users.
• Integrated **SaaS** and **PaaS** solutions, optimizing deployment processes and enhancing system scalability to support **1 million** transactions per day.
• Established real-time data communication channels using **WebSockets**, **Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ**, enabling immediate alerts and compliance workflows for financial operations.
• Built ETL workflows with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving **85%** reduction in data processing time for financial analytics and reporting.
• Employed **AI/ML** algorithms for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, resulting in a **40%** decrease in fraudulent transaction rates.
• Developed comprehensive ML pipelines using **MLflow** and **Airflow** for credit scoring and transaction classification, enhancing predictive capabilities and informed decision-making within financial systems.
• Collaborated with teams to implement effective communication strategies addressing the integration of **Salesforce**, **MS Dynamics**, and various telecommunication systems including **Genesys** and **Avaya**, ensuring seamless interaction between platforms.
• Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving and time management skills by delivering projects in alignment with **Agile** methodologies and strict timelines.

• Developed and optimized **REST**ful APIs and **SOAP** services for backend functionality in a global e-commerce platform, enhancing user engagement and streamlining customer interactions.
• Utilized **Node.js** alongside **JavaScript** frameworks such as **Express** and **NestJS** to create scalable server architectures, significantly improving system performance and reducing latency by **30%**.
• Engineered robust communication features leveraging **WebSockets** and **AJAX**, facilitating real-time order tracking and customer support, which led to improved user satisfaction ratings by **25%**.
• Implemented secure and adaptable **SaaS** solutions hosted on **AWS** and **Heroku**, enabling seamless integrations with third-party services like **Salesforce** and **Zendesk** for enhanced business processes.
• Designed dynamic user interfaces utilizing **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **Bootstrap**, and **JavaScript** frameworks such as **React** and **Angular**, ensuring fast, responsive experiences that improved customer retention by **15%**.
• Managed data storage and retrieval through **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, optimizing data access times by **40%** in high-traffic environments and maintaining system reliability.
• Applied advanced algorithms in AI and ML using **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow** for developing personalization features, resulting in increased conversion rates of **20%** through tailored recommendations.
• Implemented caching strategies with **Redis** for product metadata and search results, significantly reducing database load and accelerating page load times.
• Conducted A/B testing and controlled rollouts using **Kubernetes** and feature flags via **LaunchDarkly**, enhancing deployment strategies and minimizing downtime during updates.
• Collaborated on secure payment transactions leveraging **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring compliance with PCI standards for safeguarding transactional data.
• Enforced access control by implementing **OAuth 2.0** and **RBAC**, aligning with **GDPR** regulations to ensure data protection across the platform.
